Company: Hudson Valley Host
Website: www.HudsonValleyHost.com

Hudson Valley Host is having a HUGE labor day sale on our VPS accounts.  We are offering 40% off recurring on all VPS accounts.

This is a limited time offer and supplies are limited. The discount is recurring and will stay with your account as long as your have it.


Choice of location: Lithuania, Dallas, TX, NYC Metro Area, Orlando FL and Scranton, PA.

Our website is located at http://www.hudsonvalleyhost.com

Unmanaged VPS Plans: http://hudsonvalleyhost.com/vps.php

Test IP/file for each location:
Dallas: http://63.143.37.161/test100.bin
New York: http://204.145.80.237/test100.bin
Scranton: http://199.168.140.89/test100.bin
Lithuania: http://77.79.11.205/test100.bin


The coupon code to receive the 40% off recurring is: **laborday402012**

ALL VPS Include:
SolusVM VPS Panel
# 99.9% Uptime
# OpenVZ Virtualization Platform
# Choice of OS
# 24/7 Support

Here is our starter plan:

256 MB RAM 512mb RAM Burst
